\## Packages

\`\`\`{r}

library(readr)

library(dplyr)

library(ggplot2)

library(lubridate)

\`\`\`

\## Data Import

\`\`\`{r}

claims \<- read_csv("csv/claims.csv")

View(claims)

\`\`\`

\## Data Cleaning

\`\`\`{r}

monthly_summary \<- claims %\>%

group_by(month = floor_date(service_date, "month")) %\>%

summarise(

num_claims = n(id),

num_patients = n_distinct(patient_id)

) %\>%

\`\`\`

\## Data Vizualization

\`\`\`{r}

ggplot(monthly_summary, aes(x = month)) +

geom_line(aes(y = num_claims, color = "Number of Claims")) +

geom_line(aes(y = num_patients, color = "Number of Patients")) +

labs(

title = "Monthly Claims and Patients",

x = "Month",

y = "Count",

color = "Legend"

) +

scale_x_date(date_labels = "%Y-%m", date_breaks = "1 month") +

theme_minimal() +

theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

\`\`\`
